contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 14, 1953 D Northumberland Brass Band League (Section B)
Northumberland Brass Band League (Section B) 0 Test Piece Contest
northumberland-brass-band-league-section-b
None
Central Hall, Gosforth March contest 1st Pegswood, 2nd Coxlodge. Hymn tune 1st Coxlodge, 2nd Pegswood. Restricted to 2nd and 3rd section Northumberland bands. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 28, 2013, 11:12 a.m. April 1, 2019, 9:28 a.m.
1 Coxlodge Institute Band Joseph Welsh
2 Pegswood Colliery Prize Band James Farrell
3 Woodhorn Colliery J. Locker
4 Netherton Colliery Workmens George Lee
